constituent: regret, resentment, Freud, state of mind, silver
koohiiStory1: The athlete´s state of mind is nothing but resentment after getting the silver medal.
koohiiStory2: Data´s greatest resentment is getting a silver medal in Science Olympiad. (Image: Data fuming on the podium muttering about being half robot).
readingExamples: 恨む (うら.む), 恨めしい (うら.めしい)
